Articles.Content:
YOU RELEASED IT! Thanks!

No problem .

- - - Updated - - -

I can proofread and possibly write scripts if I have time. I could also create models in KSP.

I really don't have a script but I might take that option if you wanted to- but the models thing I definitely would like to take up .
Still looking for some new ideas...
Happy New Years everyone and I didn't do any recording because I was busy with family , but that wont be the case tomorrow so I promise to record something and have SRG release a video as well.

Sorry about using the same music, The issue is we don't have decent background music. Suggestions?

Also, Rendering the video takes a while. I have to put the sound with music, throw it on video, Mess with volume and stuff. Then it takes 40 minutes for it to export

Better then nothing ham

EDIT: I said ham...

Sorry about using the same music, The issue is we don't have decent background music. Suggestions?

Also, Rendering the video takes a while. I have to put the sound with music, throw it on video, Mess with volume and stuff. Then it takes 40 minutes for it to export

Better then nothing ham

EDIT: I said ham...

Why ham...
Alright gonna begin some recording here soon.
Going to send SRG more videos when I get home.
Well, easy fix for some free background music: Kevin Macloed. As well, I would not be afraid to do the occasional fact check for you, if you really needed the help.

Well, easy fix for some free background music: Kevin Macloed. As well, I would not be afraid to do the occasional fact check for you, if you really needed the help.

He's what we currently use. I'd take you on if you were willing to be there on a reliable rate that would work with our pattern.

Two things:

1: Good, Kevin Macloed is great, and so is his music

2: Im not sure if I would be able to help as often as you may like. I'll still help around a bit, if you would like, but more because I think this is a neat thing you are doing, and I'd like to provide a little bit of help.

Well any help at any poit is accepted

Also I have two videos in queue but life has gotten VERY hectic with SEVERAL exams in the next week so once they pass I'll have plenty of time after taking them before things kick back into normal gear.

Two things:

1: Good, Kevin Macloed is great, and so is his music

2: Im not sure if I would be able to help as often as you may like. I'll still help around a bit, if you would like, but more because I think this is a neat thing you are doing, and I'd like to provide a little bit of help.

I would like some help if you could. If anything, We'd need better backgroud music(We spent a while finding some and only got 2 good ones )

And some other stuffs if you are interested.

-------

New video up soon. Waiting on Zoo to upload. Tomorrow, I'll get more video and start working on the next few videos.

Thanks.

Well, I'll look into music for you guys. Any contribution is fine by me. What kind of music would you like? Genre, that is.

- - - Updated - - -

Currently Surfing the Incompotech Website.

Edited January 10, 2015 by Acemcbean

Well, I'll look into music for you guys. Any contribution is fine by me. What kind of music would you like? Genre, that is.

- - - Updated - - -

Currently Surfing the Incompotech Website.

Preferably calm and serene music- we currently use Music for Manatees since it fits best but the Gamecube Menu theme is a very good common example of what we like.

Yeah, good you answered back quickly. I was already looking through some more Upbeat songs.

- - - Updated - - -

Currently have a list of some songs. Tell me how you like them.

-Water Lily

-String Impromptu Number 1

-Space 1990

-The Path Of The Goblin King

Yeah, good you answered back quickly. I was already looking through some more Upbeat songs.

- - - Updated - - -

Currently have a list of some songs. Tell me how you like them.

-Water Lily

-String Impromptu Number 1

-Space 1990

-The Path Of The Goblin King

If you have a steam let me know- we can contact faster.

Also- Links?

- - - Updated - - -

I'm ZooNamedGames on steam btw- with the KMC original logo as my profile pic.
Again I apologize for the delay of videos but I've got finals all next week and an essay due TOMORROW so I was kinda flooded suddenly... but I'll release two videos today.

Ah, I probably should have gotten the links. Anyways, I just sent you a FR on Steam.

One video is going to go up soon.

Zoo has been sent edited version.

This week is going to be VERY slow. Since he has all that stuff to do.

Thanks everyone for holding on!

Yeah again a MILLION apologies especially since there wouldn't be a delay ever again BUT I was expected for this week to be so crunched with an essay, a test I had to do TODAY AND having 5 exams taking place this next week. So I will try to recollect and work this out.

Alright- after an extra delay thanks to exams I plan on rebooting VERY soon- I'm going to try a new technique of recording which may increase video release rates- granted I can promise that video quality will drop but I think I should be able to work around that...

After almost an 8 month disappearance, I finally have decided that I can revive this (sufficiently). However, I would like to ask the community, should I come back? Did you guys like my videos? What suggestions do you have? Let me know of your thoughts, and if the community wants me to, then I'll return to my series, Science Lectures.
I'd say accompany the speech with more pics. Relevant ones, not just random gameplay, kind of like how Scott Manley does his science videos.

I'd say accompany the speech with more pics. Relevant ones, not just random gameplay, kind of like how Scott Manley does his science videos.

I had someone who did that for me originally, but it's been a while since then. Moroever, if you haven't already, go watch my Introduction video. It'll explain my computer setup and why things are done the way they are. As to the relevance of the picture or the timing, that was all the other person who was managing that (same for the background gameplay). I can only make an audio stream, from there I'd ship it to him and he would add background music and visuals.

So I'll keep it in mind, but it's not 100% in my control. It would be nice if you could help me though with my videos.
